org.drip.measure.bayesian

Class ScopingProjectionVariateDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.measure.bayesian.ScopingProjectionVariateDistribution

  • public class ScopingProjectionVariateDistribution
extends java.lang.Object
    ScopingProjectionVariateContainer holds the Scoping Variate Distribution, the Projection Variate Distributions, and the Projection Variate Loadings based off of the Scoping Variates.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
